Class KnobDialogProfile

java.lang.Object
de.linearbits.swt.widgets.KnobDialogProfile
public class KnobDialogProfile
extends java.lang.Object
A language profile for the input dialog.

    • getMessage

      public java.lang.String getMessage()
      Returns the message. "[type]" will be replaced by a text for the datatype, defined via setDecimal() and setInteger(), and "[range]" will be replaced by the range. Default is: "Please enter a [type] in range [range]:"
      Returns:

      public KnobDialogProfile setMessage​(java.lang.String value)
